name: Winter Sleep - Deluxe Edition
description:
This was a buggy LudumDare40 game orginally.But not now :D

Jam Edition :https://cenullum.itch.io/winter-sleep

Also You can play it in Kongregate: WEB PLAY

And Android : GOOGLE PLAY

My Twitter

Keys:

  • WASD - Move
  • J - Eating ( be carefull :D)
  • K - Interactive(ride horse,car and when stocking)
  • L - Throwing Food for Defence Self
  • M - Map ( there is a hidden food , you can't even see with map :D )
  • P - Pause

 I added many features:

  • Fixed throwing food
  • Edited introduction
  • Added move animation
  • Score pop-up
  • Realtime Map
  • Mixed positions of trees at world end for looks good
  • Car acceleration decreased
  • New textures , images , title
  • Snow effect
  • Food and car trail effect
  • Halo on interactiveable items like car ,bag ,horse 
  •  Fixed continuing move of enemy after gameover
  •  Fixed the compass showing random food instead of nearest one
  • Footprint of bear,humans,horse
  • Added eating sound effect
  • Volume decreased
  • Human go back after follow

WHAT CHANGED: ( CTRL + Middle Mouse Button for Zoom In)

------------------------------------

VERSION 1.7:

  • Added Mega Jump 
  • HUGE OPTIMIZATION!!!!!!!
  • Added Halo to show attack way
  • ANDROID VERSION RELEASED 
  • More White Color
